sentences.sContent: Crabs have two sharp and large pincers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Crabs have two sharp and large pincers.
sentences.sCn: 螃蟹有两个又大又锋利的钳子。

sentences.sContent: The point is to keep one stick still and move the other so as to make them wok like pincers.
sentences.sContent_eng: The point is to keep one stick still and move the other so as to make them wok like pincers.
sentences.sCn: 要点是让其中的一根筷子保持不动，活动另一根筷子，以便能像钳子一样夹取食物。

sentences.sContent: The point is to keep one stick still and move the other so as to make them work like pincers.
sentences.sContent_eng: The point is to keep one stick still and move the other so as to make them work like pincers.
sentences.sCn: 要点是让其中的一根筷子保持不动，活动另一根筷子，以便能像钳子一样夹取食物。
